hero.title: Fuel Your Workday
hero.subtitle: with Nutritious Meals
hero.description: Ready-to-eat, delicious meals delivered directly to your job site. Built for hardworking people who deserve better food.

features.title: Why Choose Katameal?
features.subtitle: We understand the needs of hardworking professionals
features.feature1Description: No need to leave work. We deliver hot, fresh meals right where you are.
features.feature2Description: High-protein, balanced meals designed to keep you energized throughout the day.
features.feature3Description: Weekly or monthly subscriptions with discounts for long-term commitments.
features.feature4Description: No cooking, no cleanup. More time for what matters to you.
features.feature5Description: Consistent delivery times you can count on, every single day.
features.feature6Description: Fresh ingredients, prepared daily by experienced chefs.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in 3 simple steps
howItWorks.step1Description: Select from our weekly or monthly subscription options that fit your schedule.
howItWorks.step2Description: Tell us your job site location and preferred delivery time.
howItWorks.step3Description: Receive fresh, delicious meals delivered on time, every time.

weeklyMenu.title: This Week's Menu
weeklyMenu.subtitle: Fresh, nutritious meals prepared daily by our expert chefs
weeklyMenu.meal1Description: Perfectly seasoned grilled chicken breast over fluffy quinoa with roasted vegetables and a light lemon herb sauce.
weeklyMenu.meal2Description: Tender slow-cooked BBQ beef served with roasted sweet potato wedges, steamed broccoli, and house-made coleslaw.
weeklyMenu.meal3Description: Fresh Atlantic salmon glazed with homemade teriyaki sauce, served with brown rice and Asian-style stir-fried vegetables.
weeklyMenu.meal4Description: Homemade turkey meatballs in rich marinara sauce with whole wheat pasta, topped with fresh basil and parmesan.
weeklyMenu.meal5Description: Seasoned chicken strips with saut√©ed bell peppers and onions, cilantro-lime rice, black beans, and fresh pico de gallo.
weeklyMenu.meal6Description: Premium ribeye steak grilled to perfection with garlic mashed potatoes, grilled asparagus, and mushroom gravy.
